rows.label: bf11130100_0010
rows.name: Erm, Your Highness?

rows.label: bf11130100_0020
rows.name: Just call me Adel. What's up?

rows.label: bf11130100_0030
rows.name:
Regarding your offer last night...
could we put it on hold for a bit?

rows.label: bf11130100_0040
rows.name: Oh? Something else you need to take care of?

rows.label: bf11130100_0050
rows.name: Yeah, sort of...

rows.label: bf11130100_0060
rows.name:
Laura-sama is searching for the whereabouts
of her mother.

rows.label: bf11130100_0070
rows.name:
But her mercenary work takes up her time, so I've
been searching for her mother's location by myself.

rows.label: bf11130100_0080
rows.name: I see.

rows.label: bf11130100_0085
rows.name: And did you find her?

rows.label: bf11130100_0090
rows.name: Yes.

rows.label: bf11130100_0095
rows.name:
With all the commotion,
I completely forgot to report back.

rows.label: bf11130100_0100
rows.name:
Laura-sama, your mother has now
settled in a place called Torigo Village.

rows.label: bf11130100_0110
rows.name: Torigo Village...

rows.label: bf11130100_0120
rows.name: That's on the edge of Gula.

rows.label: bf11130100_0130
rows.name:
That area sees a lot of skirmishes between
Superbia and Shiya. A dangerous region.

rows.label: bf11130100_0140
rows.name: Indeed.

rows.label: bf11130100_0150
rows.name:
Right, it's decided.
We're going to Torigo Village.

rows.label: bf11130100_0160
rows.name: Huh?! But what about your mission?

rows.label: bf11130100_0170
rows.name: Aren't you worried about your mom?

rows.label: bf11130100_0180
rows.name: Of course I am, but...

rows.label: bf11130100_0190
rows.name: Then let's go. Metsu hasn't reached that area yet.

rows.label: bf11130100_0200
rows.name: Meaning the reverse could also be true.

rows.label: bf11130100_0210
rows.name: So you're saying we might run into Metsu?

rows.label: bf11130100_0220
rows.name: Exactly.

rows.label: bf11130100_0230
rows.name: That sounds too easy...

rows.label: bf11130100_0240
rows.name: We are going to Torigo Village to search for Metsu.

rows.label: bf11130100_0245
rows.name: You'll go to Torigo Village looking for your mother.

rows.label: bf11130100_0250
rows.name: I see no problem here.

rows.label: bf11130100_0260
rows.name: And once I find my mother, I help you?

rows.label: bf11130100_0270
rows.name: Yes. I'd be happy if you did.

rows.label: bf11130100_0280
rows.name:
I'll have one of my men send word
to your mercenary group.

rows.label: bf11130100_0290
rows.name:
Oh, and how about we have your mother
come live in the capital?

rows.label: bf11130100_0300
rows.name: It's safe there.

rows.label: bf11130100_0310
rows.name: What a whimsical prince.

rows.label: bf11130100_0320
rows.name: It's a real pain for those of us getting dragged along.

rows.label: bf11130100_0330
rows.name: You don't have to come with us, you know.

rows.label: bf11130100_0340
rows.name:
Unfortunately for you, a Driver and Blade
are two halves of a whole.

rows.label: bf11130100_0350
rows.name:
Funny, coming from the one who always
fights on her own terms.

rows.label: bf11130100_0360
rows.name: I can't deny that I'm whimsical, but...

rows.label: bf11130100_0370
rows.name:
But right now, we have no idea where
we might encounter Metsu.

rows.label: bf11130100_0380
rows.name: I think you'll be safer if we travel together.
